author: slava77
body:
GlobalSystemOfUnits.h and its equivalent G4PhysicalConstants.hh put a few singe character (`m, s, g`) and other short-name symbols in the global scope. The scoped SystemOfUnits.h seems to be more appropriate for a large sw project like CMSSW.
Recall that we discourage using single character symbols in general.

A large fraction of the files were not even using the symbols from the global scope and directly picked them from the `CLHEP` namespace.

No changes are expected.
title: switch to CLHEP/Units/SystemOfUnits to avoid numerous single character symbols in global scope
